2: <mistake>dbas</mistake> gsungs <mistake>so////de</mistake> nas <mistake>rji</mistake> ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin <mistake>zhen/phrog</mistake> byed ma dang 'dzin byed <mistake>ma//gzund</mistake> thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma//nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo
3: dag/mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu <mistake>grags//ganga</mistake> gis <mistake>sgra</mistake> ni bstan gyur na//de la dpral ba bstan par bya//mig la <mistake>son</mistake> pa gang yin pa//de la lte ba bstan par bya//gang gis lte ba bstan pa
4: na//de la <mistake>mchuni</mistake> rab tu bstan//gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na//de la so ni rab tu <mistake>bstan//gnga</mistake> gis lce ni bstan <mistake>'gyurn//de</mistake> la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur//gang gis <mistake>bha</mistake> ga bstan gyur na//
5: de la <mistake>leng</mistake> ga bstan par bya//gang gis <mistake>rjes</mistake> <mistake>dga</mistake> <mistake>rabstnna</mistake> ni//de la <mistake>barlni</mistake> bstan par bya//gang gis <mistake>parla</mistake> ni bstan <mistake>'gyur</mistake> <mistake>na// de</mistake> la rkang mthil bstan par bya//gang <mistake>gs</mistake> rkang mthil bstan
6: <mistake>nani//de</mistake> la sen mo bstan par bya//gang gis mchan <mistake>kung</mistake> bstan gyur na//de la smin <mistake>la</mistake> bstan par bya//gang gis sgra sgrogs byed gyur na//de la <mistake>chos</mistake> <mistake>ngs</mistake> bya ba'o//gang <mistake>gs</mistake>
7: kha yang bstan na ni//de la zhags pa bstan par <mistake>bya// gang</mistake> gis gsal <mistake>shid</mistake> bstan gyur na//de la mdung thung bstan par <mistake>bya///gang</mistake> gis sen mo bstan na ni//de la nu ma rab
8: tu bstan//gang gis khu tshur <mistake>bstann</mistake> ni//de la mtshams su bstan par bya//gang gis lce ni bstan gyur <mistake>na// de</mistake> la bshang gci bstan par bya//gang gis mi sdug gzugs <mistake>byedna//de</mistake> la
